HEADLINE: Transcript of Analysts/Investors Call pertaining to the Financial Results for the quarter ended September 30, 2021

The same is also being made available on the Company's website at: https://www.tatachemicals.com/Investors/Financial-reports/Investor-call-transcripts ....
